Uses of Class
nl.naturalis.common.util.InvalidEnvironmentException

Packages that use InvalidEnvironmentException
Package Description
nl.naturalis.common.util
Miscellaneious utility classes.

  • Uses of InvalidEnvironmentException in nl.naturalis.common.util

    Methods in nl.naturalis.common.util that throw InvalidEnvironmentException
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Optional<Boolean> EnvManager.getAsBoolean​(String name)
    Returns an Optional containing the boolean value of the specified environment variable or an empty Optional if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    boolean EnvManager.getAsBoolean​(String name, boolean dfault)
    Returns the value of the specified environment variable as a boolean or a default value if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    OptionalInt EnvManager.getAsInt​(String name)
    Returns an OptionalInt containing the integer value of the specified environment variable or an empty OptionalInt if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    int EnvManager.getAsInt​(String name, int dfault)
    Returns the value of the specified environment variable as an integer or a default value if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    String EnvManager.getRequired​(String name)
    Returns the value of the specified environment variable or throws an InvalidEnvironmentException if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    boolean EnvManager.getRequiredAsBoolean​(String name)
    Returns the value of the specified environment variable as an int or throws an InvalidEnvironmentException if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
    int EnvManager.getRequiredAsInt​(String name)
    Returns the value of the specified environment variable as an int or throws an InvalidEnvironmentException if there is no environment variable with the specified name.
